cleaned_text: Insomnia?](https://www.nhchalton.com/georgetown/holistic-nutritionist/meditation-can-help-insomnia/) How Meditation can help with Insomnia? Insomnia includes a variety of symptoms associated with sleep disturbance. It can include inability or difficulty to fall asleep, frequent waking, restlessness at night, disordered sleep cycle and dream disturbed sleep.
